reviews.review:
For ages I wanted to give a bad review to this blockbuster (and I did) for one simple reason: they did not write PART ONE, after the title. A small omission that permitted the producers  to make a lot of extra cash. Now I think that at least was something unexpected and one of the biggest twists I saw in ages
With PART TWO smashing records at the box office, I went back and watched it again, without being pissed off like the first time, and I have to admit that is good action movie. I still think there are too many characters and too many "kill who you love to save/destroy the universe" scenes... but I had my fun, and now I will have to go to the cinema and be part of the circus... again.
This movie was incredible. It had me on the edge of my scene the whole time. Everything that happens is well paced dispite how much they have to juggle.

Yo iss ya boi, frankly this movie is amazing, however I feel as though it is more aimed towards folks who have a decent amount of knowledge concerning the MCU. Still worth a watch if you enjoy action heavy rides however.
Great movie from Start to finish. Leaves you wanting more

This is definitely one of the best MCU movies I have ever seen. The fact that they took all these characters from different films, directed them in one movie, and still made them feel like themselves and have great chemistry together is just fantastic. Thanks was an amazing and compelling villain, and the ending of this movie left me speechless.

One of the only good MCU supervillains. The movie was good but it was a marvel movie. They're always good but they always feel the exact same. The ending was great but that's the only remarkable thing about this mostly boring movie.

Ambitious and done remarkably well, the film is the first part of a story that uses the past 10 years to its advantages and capitalizes. 

This installment continues the recent Disney trend of subversion of expectations, however, as it is also the 19th film of the series the twist is refreshing and the emotional moments have been earned. While the film is nearly 3 hours the story is smartly blacked into smaller interconnected sub arcs, and the Avengers villian is almost treated as the protagonist of the film. 

The film may not have as pointed a commentary as Nolan's Dark Kight, however it is extremely satisfying to see a Marvel villian with motivations and emotional depth besides Loki.
A PERFECT CONCLUSION FOR 10 YEARS OF MOVIES.
Thanos!! Easily in the top 5 Marvel movies :)
